name: Convert Notebooks

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - main  # Запускать при пуше в главную ветку

jobs:
  convert:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
      - name: Checkout code
        uses: actions/checkout@v2

      - name: Set up Python
        uses: actions/setup-python@v2
        with:
          python-version: '3.12'

      - name: Install dependencies
        run: |
          pip install jupyter quarto

      - name: Run conversion scripts
        run: |
          chmod +x script/convert-jupyter-py.sh
          chmod +x script/convert-jupyter-quarto.sh
          chmod +x script/convert-quarto-html.sh
          ./script/convert-jupyter-py.sh
          ./script/convert-jupyter-quarto.sh
          ./script/convert-quarto-html.sh
